Formerly wielded by one who forsook all ties of friendship and kindness, this sword is rife with deranged energies. It seems to transmit feelings of contentment when carving through bones.

BG3 Blackguard's Sword Information

Dazing Smite: On a hit infused with one of your Smites, the target must succeed a Constitution Saving Throw or become Dazed. Weapon Enchantment +2 Proficiency with this weapon type unlocks: Pommel Strike Lacerate Rush
